attributes.action: encourage the banking system to allow the continued use of chequebooks, free of charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Payment by cheque or by cash is the simplest and cheapest way for individuals to make payments to each other. Many of us are worried by the continual pressure to pay by card, and many small businesses simply cannot afford to run these systems. Most important of all: keep banking free for those in credit!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
